content: Well Scot, many things I like. A few now leave me scratching my head. The puzzle picture has changed mid-assembly. I’ll keep piecing with new rules of my own. I do not believe I have access to the Medium word count function on my mobile. I will stick with google docs word count while I continue to play the game. Thanks for reading and commenting. I am completely winging this. A goal of 700 to 1000 words seems like a good destination right now.
